item.title: bridge2mint - a project built using pntfx
item.description: We are happy to share another project built with pntfx: bridge2mint. This project by the Institute of Mathematics at TU Hamburg features a “knowledge network of fundamental mathematical concepts for a successful start in MINT studies”. Available in English and German. Visit www3.tuhh.de/e-10/bridge2mint/ for more information and check out the GitLab repositories .

item.title: doks showcase is featuring pntfx
item.description: We are proud to be featured in the Doks Showcase . So far, we are the only Doks project using the Cytocoscape.js powered graph navigation functionality .
